thread.title: TABLE-Peru posts $226 million trade deficit in August -central bank
thread.title_full: TABLE-Peru posts $226 million trade deficit in August -central bank | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: TABLE-Peru posts $226 million trade deficit in August -central bank
text:
LIMA Oct 16 Peru, a top global exporter of copper and other minerals, posted a $226 million trade deficit in August, central bank chief economist Adrian Armas said on Friday.
The reading brings the shortfall logged so far this year to about $2.6 billion, according to central bank data.
Peru's exports have fallen in the past year on slumping mineral prices. The central bank has estimated a $2.1 billion trade deficit in 2015 and $2 billion in 2016.
August 2015 August 2014 Balance -226 mln +30.9 mln Exports 2.949 bln 3.624 bln Imports 3.175 bln 3.593 bln (Reporting By Teresa Cespedes)
